resources.string: Dermatology app based on Machine learning and AI
Get your diagnosis just from a simple picture
Keep an organized and well preserved archive of your diagnosis
Search for illnesses and get all the information related to it
Get all the information that concerns the app from the home page

Our application offers a huge variaty of dermatologic illnesses and our model is able to detect them in a small period of time, the app itself offers other useful functionalities that should make the follow up process easy.
